title: Mans Olson: Minecraft官方启动器的进展

txt_content:

Mans Olson: 说到新的Minecraft启动器，这是目前的样子。工作正在进行中！


Henrik Pettersson ?：看起来不错，运行它!!!11 >:)
原文
Mans Olson:Speaking of the new Minecraft launcher, here's what it currently looks like. Work in progress!


Henrik Pettersson ?：Looks great, ship it!!!11 >:)

replies.author: 豆丁宝宝龙
replies.txt_content: 我更希望官方能在验证服务器上多下功夫，而不是仅改一个启动器。你说啥时在线启动能和离线启动一样快呀！
